p: Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK), A549, and 293T cells were obtained from ATCC (Manassas, VA, USA) and were maintained in minimal essential medium (MEM) in the case of MDCKs or in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium (DMEM; Gibco, Invitrogen) in the case of 293T and A549 cells, supplemented with 10% FBS, 100 U/ml penicillin, and 100 mg/ml streptomycin (Gibco, Invitrogen).
